short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 直接在当前页面中以弹出层方式查看网页源代码(真正的网页源代码)，无需再弹出一个标签页
short.en,en_US: View the original source code in the current tab with a popup rather than in a new tab,code highlight,linenumber,highlight current…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
zvSource查看网页源代码插件可以直接在当前页面中以弹出层方式查看网页源代码(真正的网页源代码)，无需再弹出一个标签页。

插件亮点：
1、当前页面查看网页源码，真实源码
2、语法高亮，行号显示
3、高亮当前行
long.en,en_US:
With zvSource SourceViewer you can view the original webpage source code in the current tab with a popup rather than in a new tab,code highlight,linenumber,highlight current line and more features

Features:
1.View the original source code in the current tab,real source code
2.Syntax highlight,linenumber
3.highlight current line
